"},"$:/core/images/website-collection":{"title":"$:/core/images/website-collection","created":"20250723082905751","modified":"20250723092538604","tags":"$:/tags/Image 图标 网址收藏","text":"\parameters (size:"22pt") "},"$:/core/ui/Buttons/website-collection-text-wrap":{"title":"$:/core/ui/Buttons/website-collection-text-wrap","caption":"{{$:/core/images/website-collection-text-wrap-no}} 硬式换行","created":"20250724011852152","description":"开启/关闭硬式换行","modified":"20250724015522981","tags":"按钮 $:/tags/ViewToolbar 硬式换行级联","text":"<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="开启/关闭硬式换行"> <$list filter="[field:br[yes]]"> <$action-deletefield $field="br"/> <$list filter="[!has:field[br]]"> <$action-setfield $field="br" $value="yes"/> <$list filter="[field:br[yes]]"> {{$:/core/images/website-collection-text-wrap|30px}} <$list filter="[!has:field[br]]"> {{$:/core/images/website-collection-text-wrap-no|30px}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]">开启/关闭硬式换行 "},"$:/core/ui/Buttons/website-collection":{"title":"$:/core/ui/Buttons/website-collection","caption":"{{$:/core/images/website-collection}} 打开收藏网址","created":"20250723082956292","description":"打开收藏网址","modified":"20250723092550772","tags":"按钮 $:/tags/PageControls 网址收藏","text":"\whitespace trim <$button tooltip="打开收藏网址" class=<>> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{$:/core/images/website-collection}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text=打开收藏网址/> <$action-navigate $to="收藏网址"/> "},"$:/custom/ui/ViewTemplate/body/br-yes":{"title":"$:/custom/ui/ViewTemplate/body/br-yes","code-body":"yes","created":"20240329014222972","modified":"20250723065942000","tags":"级联 硬式换行级联","text":"\define blank-line-all() (?:\r\n|\r|\n) \define blank-line() \define br-yes()
\define br-n-br()
\r?\n
\define br-br()

\define br-n()
\r?\n <$let step1={{{ [get[text]search-replace:g:regexp,] }}}> <$let brText={{{ [search-replace:g:regexp,[]search-replace:g:regexp,[ ]search-replace:g:regexp,[]] }}}> <$transclude $variable="brText" $output="text/html" $mode="block"/> "},"$:/plugins/dyp/website-collection-text-wrap/history":{"title":"$:/plugins/dyp/website-collection-text-wrap/history","created":"20250724021126599","modified":"20250724021133019","tags":"","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"; v.0.0.2 2025-07-24 # 修复取消编辑按钮不生效的问题； "},"$:/plugins/dyp/website-collection-text-wrap/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/dyp/website-collection-text-wrap/readme","created":"20250724021052932","modified":"20250724021111571","tags":"","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"; 网址收藏和硬式换行级联"},"$:/plugins/dyp/website-collection-text-wrap/usage":{"title":"$:/plugins/dyp/website-collection-text-wrap/usage","created":"20250724021116170","modified":"20250724021123598","tags":"","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":""},"删除所有带前缀收藏网址的状态条目":{"title":"删除所有带前缀收藏网址的状态条目","created":"20250723081543394","modified":"20250723092433518","tags":"备份 网址收藏","text":"<$button class="tc-btn-invisible website-collection-edit" tooltip="删除所有收藏网址状态条目"> <$action-deletetiddler $filter="[prefix[$:/state/收藏网址/]]"/> {{$:/core/images/website-collection-delete-state|16px}} "},"包含字段br=yes的条目":{"title":"包含字段br=yes的条目","br":"yes","created":"20240101154616359","modified":"20250723070247880","tags":"硬式换行级联","text":"如果没有首行缩进 　　带有首行缩进两字符的段落 　　带有首行缩进两字符的段落 　　带有首行缩进两字符的段落 　　带有首行缩进两字符的段落 如果没有首行缩进"},"带小标题的硬式换行测试":{"title":"带小标题的硬式换行测试","br":"yes","created":"20250723034125448","modified":"20250723070723740","tags":"硬式换行级联","text":"经测试，块级元素可支持小标题，不支持无序/有序列表、代码块、引用块 * 无序列表 * 无序列表 * 无序列表 # 有序列表 # 有序列表 # 有序列表 !!! 小标题 这是正文呀 ```tw 这是代码块 ``` <<< 这是引用 <<<"},"收藏网址":{"title":"收藏网址","created":"20250718070721527","modified":"20250724020821972","tags":"参考 网址收藏","text":"<>
<$transclude tiddler="删除所有带前缀收藏网址的状态条目"/><$transclude tiddler="新建网址收藏按钮"/>
<$transclude tiddler="收藏网址汇总" mode="block"/>"},"收藏网址汇总":{"title":"收藏网址汇总","created":"20250722062010357","modified":"20250723094630066","tags":"参考 网址收藏","text":"\define blank-line-all() (?:\r\n|\r|\n) \define blank-line() \define br-yes()
\define br-n-br()
\r?\n
\define br-br()

\define br-n()
\r?\n <$list filter="[tag[收藏网址]sort[title]]"> <$qualify name="state" title={{{ [[$:/state/收藏网址/]addsuffix] }}}>

<$reveal type="nomatch" stateTitle=<> text="open"> <$button setTitle=<> setTo="open" class="tc-btn-invisible"> {{$:/core/images/right-arrow}} <$reveal type="match" stateTitle=<> text="open"> <$button setTitle=<> setTo="close" class="tc-btn-invisible"> {{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} <$link to={{!!title}}>{{!!title}}

<$reveal type="match" stateTitle=<> text="open" retain="yes">
<$let editState={{{ [[$:/state/text-edit/]addsuffix] }}} originalValue={{{ [[$:/temp/text-original/]addsuffix] }}}>
<$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text="yes"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible website-collection-edit" tooltip="编辑内容"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text="yes"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text={{!!text}}/> {{$:/core/images/edit-button|16px}}
<$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text="yes"> <$let step1={{{ [get[text]search-replace:g:regexp,] }}}> <$let brText={{{ [search-replace:g:regexp,[]search-replace:g:regexp,[ ]search-replace:g:regexp,[]] }}}> <$transclude $variable="brText" $output="text/html" $mode="block"/> <$reveal type="match" state=<> text="yes">
<$transclude tiddler="$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/body/editor" mode="inline"/>
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible website-collection-edit-cancel" tooltip="取消编辑"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text={{{ [get[text]] }}}/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> {{$:/core/images/cancel-button|16px}} <$button class="tc-btn-invisible website-collection-edit-done" tooltip="完成编辑" style="margin-left: 0.5em;"> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> {{$:/core/images/done-button|16px}}
"},"收藏网址汇总样式css":{"title":"收藏网址汇总样式css","created":"20250722063530746","modified":"20250723083404805","tags":"样式 $:/tags/Stylesheet 网址收藏","text":".website-collection { border-top: 0px solid #A0956B; /* 移除上分隔线 */font-family: "FZYUEKZJW-H"; text-align: justify; /* 两端对齐 */ line-height: 1.5; /* 行高*/ letter-spacing: 0em; /* 增加字符间距 */ /* 硬式换行 */ word-break: normal; word-wrap: break-word; /* white-space: pre-wrap; 保留空白字符，包括空格、制表符和换行符。 */ white-space:pre-line; /* 连续的空白字符合并成一个空格 */ margin-bottom: 0; /* 确保没有底部边距 */ padding-bottom: 0; /* 确保没有底部内边距 */ margin-top: 1em; } .website-collection-edit, .website-collection-edit-done, .website-collection-edit-cancel { opacity: 0.5; transition: opacity 0.5s ease-in-out; } .website-collection-edit:hover, .website-collection-edit-done:hover, .website-collection-edit-cancel:hover { opacity: 1; }"},"新建网址收藏按钮":{"title":"新建网址收藏按钮","created":"20250724020406049","modified":"20250724020843305","tags":"网址收藏","text":"<$button class="tc-btn-invisible website-collection-edit" tooltip=新建网址收藏> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{$:/core/images/new-button}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text=新建网址收藏/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler" title=<> tags="收藏网址" text="" br="yes" /> "},"硬式换行级联":{"title":"硬式换行级联","created":"20250723025310707","modified":"20250723025322345","tags":"导出","type":"","text":"<>"},"硬式换行级联代码备份1":{"title":"硬式换行级联代码备份1","created":"20250723034727791","modified":"20250723060346288","tags":"备份 硬式换行级联","text":"``` \define blank-line-all() (?:\r\n|\r|\n) \define blank-line() \define br-yes()
\define br-br()
\r?\n
\define br-n()
\r?\n <$let brText={{{ [get[text]search-replace:g:regexp,search-replace:g:regexp,[]search-replace:g:regexp,[]] }}}> <$transclude $variable="brText"/> ```"},"硬式换行级联代码备份2":{"title":"硬式换行级联代码备份2","created":"20250723060315824","modified":"20250723063114239","tags":"备份 硬式换行级联","text":"``` \define blank-line-all() (?:\r\n|\r|\n) \define blank-line() \define br-yes()
\define br-n-br()
\r?\n
\define br-br()

\define br-n()
\r?\n <$let step1={{{ [get[text]search-replace:g:regexp,] }}}> <$let brText={{{ [search-replace:g:regexp,[]search-replace:g:regexp,[ ]search-replace:g:regexp,[]] }}}> <$transclude $variable="brText" $output="text/html" $mode="block"/> ```"},"网址收藏":{"title":"网址收藏","created":"20250723092448516","modified":"20250723092506149","tags":"导出","type":"","text":"<>"}}}
